name: The Great Emu War
description: The Great Emu War is a fun, frantic couch-competitive experience. Choose a side, humans or emus, in this brutal battle between species.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 | AMD FX-6300 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 2GB | AMD Radeon R9 370 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
